snippet: Jeb Bush, making his first visit to this presidential kickoff state as a likely candidate, began his bid to win the caucuses here by paying tribute to two Iowa touchstones and calibrating his message on why he supports education standards loathed by...
abstract: Jeb Bush, making his first visit to this presidential kickoff state as a likely candidate, began his bid to win the caucuses here by paying tribute to two Iowa touchstones and calibrating his message on why he supports education standards loathed by many conservatives.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Kicks Off Courtship of Iowa
